org.netbeans.editor

Class BaseElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.editor.BaseElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeafElement

    public abstract class BaseElement
extends Object
implements Element
    Element implementation. It serves as parent class for both leaf and branch elements.
